description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Travels on horseback in Mantchu Tartary: being a summer's ride beyond the Great Wall of China. With a map and numerous illustrations" Author: FLEMING, George - Veterinary Surgeon Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10055.cc.32." Page: 54 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1863 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001251204 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
